mdRecord.dcterms:title: "Origin of Flowers" and etc; 02 of 06
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 33-74, cloth sleeve"The Truth About Darwinism"; Reoccurring section of a periodical for BENA (British Empire Naturalist Association), where an ongoing discussion of multiple aspects of Darwinism is addressed by experts who write-in, along with editor comments. Select pages pulled for Faulds's notes. Included articles in this batch: "The Wild Strawberry and Colours of Flowers and Birds" with author unlisted, "Flowers and Insects" by H. S. Colthurst, and "Origin of Flowers" by John A. Hamilton.; E. Kay Robinson (E. K. R.), ed., London, p. 121-126, Country-Side; 6 pages; DF n.a.
